name: Lilipalace
description: Women have been disappearing into a mysterious labyrinth... Play as the half-elf knight Seria and uncover the truth in this Dark Fantasy RPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP,VISTA,7,8,8.1,10 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP,VISTA,7,8,8.1,10 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
